meanings.definition: To try hard to do or achieve something.
meanings.sent1: She will endeavor to finish her homework before dinner.
meanings.sent2: He always endeavors to be kind to others.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel endeavored to reach the acorn on the tall tree.
meanings.sent4: The determined climber endeavored to conquer the treacherous mountain peak.
meanings.sent5: With unwavering determination, she endeavored to learn a new language.

meanings.definition: An attempt to achieve a goal.
meanings.sent1: His endeavor to win the race was fueled by his passion for running.
meanings.sent2: The team's collective endeavor led to the successful completion of the project.
meanings.sent3: The cat's endeavor to catch the elusive red dot entertained the whole family.
meanings.sent4: The entrepreneur's endeavor to start a business was met with both challenges and triumphs.
meanings.sent5: Their shared endeavor to create a beautiful garden brought them closer together.
